story.text: Jan 2 Biopharmaceutical company Celgene Corp. (CELG.O) said its board elected Chief Executive Sol Barer to the additional position of chairman. Barer replaced John Jackson, who retired as chairman on Dec. 31, the company said in a statement. (Reporting by Manish Gupta in Bangalore)
story.title: celgene names ceo barer to additional position of chairman
